song.title: Murders In The Rue Morgue
song.info:
MURDERS IN THE RUE MORGUE
Written by Iron Maiden Covered by Malekith for BEST OF THE FANS III musicdisk.
Well, i don't have much to say here... A fast heavy tune with a very quiet intro, a good old Maiden song with Di'Anno. I didn't use any "vocal" sample because I think the guitar melodies are enough (the vocal parts are nearly the same).
Thanx to Betrayer and Cadaver for samples. Hails to Dragon, Hakan and everyone I have forgotten, I don't write all the names but you know who you are ! UP THE IRONS !
Playing time : 4'07. Hope you like this !
Malekith email : malekith@listen.to URL : http://listen.to/malekith
